description: Demonstration Project for the Renovation of Multifamily Buildings

subproject.corporate outcome: Addressing social inclusion for improving the conditions of the poor and disadvantaged groups.
subproject.description: 1) preventing social exclusion by improving the targeted population’s health and living conditions through housing renovation; 2) protecting the environment by reducing greenhouse gas emissions through energy efficiency; 3) promoting good governance by building urban social capital through supporting voluntary association of citizens.
donor_long: BUL MINISTRY OF REG DEVT AND PUBL WORKS
subproject.title: Renovation of Buildings
